sections.heading: of the district court; deposits; limitation
sections.text: The deposits secured by a surety bond shall at no time exceed the amount of the penal sum of such surety bond.SourceLaws 1947, c. 269, § 5, p. 870;Laws 1988, LB 703, § 5;Laws 1996, LB 1274, § 34.

77-2326.05.Clerk of the district court; deposits; limitation.

The deposits secured by a surety bond shall at no time exceed the amount of the penal sum of such surety bond.

SourceLaws 1947, c. 269, § 5, p. 870;Laws 1988, LB 703, § 5;Laws 1996, LB 1274, § 34.
